<a id="AnimationRootNode"></a>

# AnimationRootNode

**Inherits:** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AnimationNodeAnimation](AnimationNodeAnimation.md), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D.md), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md), [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md), [AnimationNodeStateMachine](AnimationNodeStateMachine.md)

Base class for [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md)\\ s that hold one or multiple composite animations. Usually used for [AnimationTree.tree_root](AnimationTree.md#AnimationTree_property_tree_root).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**AnimationRootNode** is a base class for [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md)\\ s that hold a complete animation. A complete animation refers to the output of an [AnimationNodeOutput](AnimationNodeOutput.md) in an [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md) or the output of another **AnimationRootNode**. Used for [AnimationTree.tree_root](AnimationTree.md#AnimationTree_property_tree_root) or in other **AnimationRootNode**\\ s.

Examples of built-in root nodes include [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md) (allows blending nodes between each other using various modes), [AnimationNodeStateMachine](AnimationNodeStateMachine.md) (allows to configure blending and transitions between nodes using a state machine pattern), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md) (allows linear blending between **three** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md)\\ s), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D.md) (allows linear blending only between **two** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md)\\ s).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
